changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `book` ( `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `price` double NOT NULL, `qty` int NOT NULL, `author_id` int DEFAULT NULL, `created_at` datetime NOT NULL, `user_id` int DEFAULT NULL, `image_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `book_author_FK` (`author_id`), KEY `book_user_FK` (`user_id`), CONSTRAINT `book_author_FK` FOREIGN KEY (`author_id`) REFERENCES `author` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `book_user_FK` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `user` (`id`) )
